main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a white object approximately 20-25 feet in size, rotating in a straight horizontal flight path near Fort Worth, Texas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted around 30 seconds., The object appeared white and oscillated as it moved., The observer noted the object was flying in a NE/SW course., Weather conditions were clear with excellent visibility., There were no unusual meteorological conditions at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a white rotating object in the sky
witness description: a civilian observer who works in a tooling department at Convair
